title: Low: grafana security, bug fix, and enhancement update
description:
Grafana is an open source, feature rich metrics dashboard and graph editor for Graphite, InfluxDB & OpenTSDB. 
The following packages have been upgraded to a later upstream version: grafana (7.5.11). (BZ#1993214)
For more details about the security issue(s), including the impact, a CVSS score, acknowledgments, and other related information, refer to the CVE page(s) listed in the References section.
Additional Changes:
For detailed information on changes in this release, see the Rocky Linux 8.6 Release Notes linked from the References section.

references.title: Update information for CVE-2021-43813 is retrieved from Red Hat
